private_settings.title: Enable Attribution writes
private_settings.name: attribution_enabled
private_settings.description: Enables writing the result of attribution in the User profile. Otherwise you can see what we would have written in the logs

private_settings.title: Only process users in these segments
private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.description: _Sends no one if empty._ Attribution will only be applied to users that belong to one or more of these segments.
